page.title: List of titles and honours of the British Crown

revisions.rev:
This '''List of titles and honours of the British Crown''' sets out the many titles of the monarch of the [[United Kingdom]] since the creation of the [[United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland]] in 1801.
== Titles held by the Monarch of United Kingdom == {{see also|List of titles and honours of Queen Elizabeth II}}
Note: Former titles marked with '''*''' are historical titles which are abolished or no longer part of the British crown.
=== Empires === * [[File:Star-of-India-gold-centre.svg|40px]] [[Emperor of India|Emperor]] of [[British Raj|India]]'''*'''
=== Kingdoms === * [[File:Royal Coat of Arms of the United Kingdom.svg|40px]] [[King of United Kingdom|King]] of [[Kingdom of Great Britain|Great Britain]]<ref>[http://www.burkespeerage.com/articles/peerage/page62-6a.aspx Royal Title of Elisabeth II, George V and Edward VIII]</ref> * [[File:Coat of Arms of England (1509-1554).svg|40px]] [[King of England|King]] of [[Kingdom of England|England]] * [[File:Royal Coat of Arms of the Kingdom of Scotland.svg|40px]] [[King of Scotland|King]] of [[Kingdom of Scotland|Scotland]] * [[File:Royal Arms of England (1399-1603).svg|40px]] [[King of France|King]] of [[France]]'''*''' * [[File:Hannover1837.jpg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Kingdom of Hanover|Hanover]]'''*''' * [[King of Canada|King]] of [[Canada]] * [[File:Australian Coat of Arms.png|40px]] [[King of Australia|King]] of [[Australia]] * [[File:Coat of Arms of New Zealand.svg|40px]] [[King of New Zealand|King]] of [[New Zealand]] * [[File:Emblem of India.svg|40px]] [[King of India|King]] of [[India]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Pakistan.svg|40px]] [[King of Pakistan|King]] of [[Pakistan]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of Arms of South Africa (1932-2000).svg|40px]] [[Monarchy of South Africa|King]] of [[Kingdom of South Africa|South Africa]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of Arms Ceylon dominion.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Dominion of Ceylon|Ceylon]]'''*''' * [[King]] of [[Ghana]]'''*''' * [[King]] of [[Nigeria]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Sierra Leone.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Sierra Leone]]'''*''' * [[File:Flag of Tanganyika.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Tanganyika]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of Arms of Jamaica.svg|40px]] [[Monarchy of Jamaica|King]] of [[Jamaica]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Trinidad and Tobago.png|40px]] [[King]] of [[Trinidad and Tobago]]'''*''' * [[King]] of [[Uganda]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Kenya.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Kenya]]'''*''' * [[File:EscudoMalawi.PNG|40px]] [[King]] of [[Malawi]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat_of_arms_of_Malta_1964-1975.svg|40px]] [[Queen of Malta|King]] of [[Malta]]'''*''' * [[King]] of [[Gambia]]'''*''' * [[King]] of [[Guyana]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Barbados.png|40px]] [[Monarchy of Barbados|King]] of [[Barbados]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Mauritius.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Mauritius]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Fiji.png|40px]] [[Monarchy of Fiji|King]] of [[Fiji]]'''*''' * [[File:Coat of arms of Bahamas.png|40px]] [[King]] of [[Bahamas]] * [[File:Flag of Grenada.svg|40px]] [[Monarchy of Grenada|King]] of [[Grenada]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Papua New Guinea.svg|40px]] [[Monarchy of Papua New Guinea|King]] of [[Papua New Guinea]] * [[King]] of [[Solomon Islands]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Tuvalu.svg|40px]] [[King]] of [[Tuvalu]] * [[King]] of [[Saint Lucia]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.png|40px]] [[King]] of [[Saint Vincent and the Grenadines]] * [[File:Coat of arms of Belize.svg|40px]] [[King]] of === Duchies === * [[File:Blason duche fr Anjou (moderne).svg|40px]] [[Duke of Anjou|Duke]] of [[Anjou]]'''*''' * [[File:Blason de l'Aquitaine et de la Guyenne.svg|40px]] [[Duke of Aquitaine|Duke]] of [[Aquitaine]]'''*''' * [[File:Arms of William the Conqueror (1066-1087).svg|40px]] [[Duke of Normandy|Duke]] of [[Normandy]] * [[File:Duchy of Lancaster-coa.png|40px]] [[Duke of Lancaster|Duke]] of [[Duchy of Lancaster|Lancaster]]
=== Electorate === * [[File:Royal Arms of the Kingdom of Hanover.svg|40px]] [[Prince-elector|Elector]] of [[Electorate of Brunswick-LÃ¼neburg|Brunswick-LÃ¼neburg]]'''*'''
=== Counties === * [[File:Armoiries Ponthieu.png|40px]] [[Count of Ponthieu|Count]] of [[Ponthieu]]'''*'''
=== Lordships === * [[File:Isle of Man coat of arms.svg|40px]] [[Lord of Mann|Lord]] of [[Isle of Man|Mann]]<ref>[http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandCrowndependencies/IsleofMan.aspx Lord of Mann Elisabeth II]</ref> * [[File:Coat of arms of the Lordship of Ireland.svg|40px]] [[Monarchy of Ireland|Lord]] of [[Lordship of Ireland|Ireland]]'''*''' * [[File:Blason de l'Aquitaine et de la Guyenne.svg|40px]] [[Lord of Aquitaine|Lord]] of [[Aquitaine]]'''*'''
=== Hereditary Orders of United Kingdom and Commonwealth realms === * [[Head of the Commonwealth]] * Sovereign of [[Order of the Garter]]
== Titles held by the heir apparent of United Kingdom == {{see also|List of titles and honours of Charles, Prince of Wales}}
=== Principalities === * [[File:Arms of Llywelyn.svg|40px]] [[Prince of Wales|Prince]] of [[Wales]]<ref>[http://www.royal.gov.uk/ThecurrentRoyalFamily/ThePrinceofWales/Stylesandtitles.aspx The Prince of Wales's full title]</ref>âtitle of the heir of the [[United Kingdom]] and earlier [[Kingdom of England]] * [[File:Blason de l'Aquitaine et de la Guyenne.svg|40px]] [[Prince of Aquitaine|Prince]] of [[Aquitaine]]'''*'''âtitle of the heir of the [[Kingdom of England]]
=== Duchies === * [[File:Arms of the Duchy of Cornwall.svg|40px]] [[Duke of Cornwall|Duke]] of [[Cornwall]] â title of the heir of the [[Kingdom of England]] * [[File:Shield of Arms of the Duke of Rothesay.svg|40px]] [[Duke of Rothesay|Duke]] of [[Rothesay]] â title of the heir of the [[Kingdom of Scotland]]
=== Earldom === * [[File:Chester Arms.gif|40px]] [[Earl of Chester|Earl]] of [[Chester]] â title of the heir of the [[Kingdom of England]] * [[File:Arms of the Earl of Carrick.svg|40px]] [[Earl of Carrick|Earl]] of [[Carrick]] â title of the heir of the [[Kingdom of Scotland]]
=== Baronial and Lordships === * [[Baron of Renfrew|Baron]] of [[Renfrew]] * [[Lord of the Isles|Lord]] of the Isles
=== Hereditary Orders of the heir apparent of United Kingdom and Commonwealth realms === * Knight of the [[Order of the Garter]] * Knight of the [[Order of the Thistle]] * Knight of the [[Order of the Bath]] * Knight of the [[Order of Merit]] * Knight of the [[Order of Australia]] * Knight of the [[Orders, decorations, and medals of Papua New Guinea|Order of Logohu]]
